name: Inky Line: Drawing Pen Puzzle
description:
Start playing NOW this awesome physics based drawing game. Be assured that it will challenge your brain and drawing skills in a whole NEW way. Once you start playing you will not be able to stop!

HOW TO PLAY:
Draw line on the screen as fast as you can and find the best solution to make the ball bounce the right way. Collect ink buckets to replenish drawing ink. The ball and the objects on the screen are responsive to real physics. Gather enough coins to unlock different balls and new color themes. Don't forget to use your strokes wisely.

GAME FEATURES:
- The game is based on real physics.
- Suitable for all ages.
- 7 different color themes and 28 different balls to choose from.
- Awesome graphic and smooth game controls.

Ready for the challenge? Download the game today for FREE and start challenging yourself and your friends to see who gets the highest score. Have fun!
